page.title: 20Dairy Farmer's Wife's Day
page.content: My day began at 6.30 with a mug of tea.The 2 boys were up playing with Lego.I made the beds,sorted the boys' clothes,bags and books for school.I had to make sandwiches and fill flasks for school lunchtime while they ate break- fast.I started the automatic washing machine.On my husband's return from milking I took the boys to school by car.Back at home we had breakfast and washed up and I hung the washing out. Off to the farm:I tedded hay ready for baling this afternoon.After lunch I stacked haybales in blocks of 12 as my husband baled them.At 3.30 met the boys at school.The family fetched the cows from the field for milking.Then I pre- pared our evening meal,listened to the children read,bathtime and bed at 8.00. I had to fit some household chores in before we retired.
